task.title: Create a GitHub Repository
task.shortdesc: First, you'll want to create a repository in GitHub.

context.p: Learn how to create a GitHub repository. This is the first step that ties everything together. Creating a repository is crucial to the process and will allow you to make a successful website and PDF.

substep.cmd: On the main page, click on the + icon in the upper right-hand corner
Select “New repository” from the drop-down menu
